member.name: PARSEDURLA
member.summary: Used by the function to return the parsed URL.

member.name: PARSEDURLA.cbSize
member.summary: [in] The size of the structure, in bytes. The calling application must set this member before calling the function.

member.name: PARSEDURLA.pszProtocol
member.summary: [out] A pointer to the beginning of the protocol part of the URL.

member.name: PARSEDURLA.cchProtocol
member.summary: The number of characters in the URL's protocol section.

member.name: PARSEDURLA.pszSuffix
member.summary: [out] A pointer to the section of the URL that follows the protocol and colon (':'). For file URLs, the function also skips the leading "//" characters.

member.name: PARSEDURLA.cchSuffix
member.summary: [out] The number of characters in the URL's suffix.

member.name: PARSEDURLA.nScheme
member.summary: [out] A value from the enumeration that specifies the URL's scheme.
